profile.name: Ahmet Alp Balkan
profile.headline: @linkedin Senior Software Engineer | Open Source Enthusiast
profile.summary: Highly motivated and experienced software engineer with a strong passion for open-source development, particularly in the Kubernetes ecosystem. Proficient in multiple programming languages including Go and Swift.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer @linkedin
description: Developed and maintained various open-source projects, including kubectl-runproxy and kubernetes.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement scalable software solutions.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Contributed to multiple open-source projects, including grpc-health-probe and baklava.
Provided high-quality software development services to clients across various industries.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and updated various open-source projects, including krew-index.
Ensured the quality and stability of these projects through rigorous testing and debugging.
